name: @hyperledger/cacti-weaver-besu-simpleasset
description: Sample Besu Application for Demonstrating Interoperation With Other Networks

scripts.copy-interop-contracts: cp ../../../core/network/besu/contracts/interop/manageAssetAny.sol contracts/ && cp ../../../core/network/besu/interface/asset-exchange/transferInterface.sol contracts/ && cp ../../../common/protos-sol/asset_locks.proto.sol contracts/
scripts.deploy-contract: npm run copy-interop-contracts && npm install --workspaces=false && npm run update-truffle-config && truffle compile && truffle migrate
